desc: Crab Walk: You must be crouching at all times and must only use left and right to move
Glass Cannon: You must buy the most expensive weapon you can afford without any shields
Simlish: All comms must be done in Simlish, or just made up language works too
Quick Swap: You must have your knife out until you spot an enemy
Spawn Tap: You must reach enemy spawn before being allowed to kill enemies
Utility Overload: You must use all your utilties before next round or you dont get any next round
Pick Two: Reroll the strat picker twice the first strat is for the whole round the 2nd strat is for post plant
Formation: All players must follow the spike carrier in a line
Trickshot: Must do a 360 before shooting any enemy
Kill The President: Decide someone on the opposite team that person must die before killing anyone else
Protect The President: Pick a player, give them the spike and hustle around them to plant
Blinds here: Only players who can flash are allowed to use abilities and are only allowed to flash
The One Gun: Pick a player, they buy a gun and that gun is the only gun allowed to shoot
CSGO: No abilities or ults
Gunswap: When you kill an enemy you must go get their weapon before killing anyone else
Silent But Deadly: Set game master volume to 0
Bend those knees: No standing up you must crouch
Broken W Key: You must always be pressing W and no shift walking
Shoutcasters: You must narrate what you are doing as if a sportcaster
Fakeout: Use all abilities at one site then rotate to the other
Evasive Maneuvers: You must jump around every corner you peek
Sound Effects: You must make the noises for everything you do, pretend you are a kid
Dog Tags: After killing you must go to the corpse of the enemy and spray it to be able to shoot
Voices from Beyond: Only dead players may give comms, and only in a ghostly manner~
Muscle Memory who dat?: Swap the keybinds for jump and shoot
Shouty keys: Every key press you make must be said out loud
Cheerleaders: After every kill all players must stop and cheer for 5 seconds
One Clip: After using a clip you must drop the gun you can pick up other peoples guns
Yes sir, Captain: Pick a player you must ask permission and recieve permission to swap weapons, reload or use abilties
Poor man's Valorant: You can't spend more than the poorest player
Inarticulate: You may only use the words "Forwards" "Back" "Left" and "Right"
Frenzy Mode: Frenzy only no abilities
Flank Patrol: At least one person must reach the enemies spawn before planting
Everybody Dance: Relies on all players having spotify, start listening to Everybody Dance by Chic at the start of the round once they say "Everybody Dance" you must start dancing in game
Meat Shield: Once the spike is planted all players must stand on it
No Time To Hide: Once the round starts you can't move until the spike has been planted
Time to retake: Wait in spawn until the spike is planted
One at a time: Only one can leave spawn at a time
Close and Personal: Shorty or Bucky only and must hold close angles in the bomb plant areas
The Power of Friendship: Choose a site, all buy odins and go to that site, stand in a line and no moving unless the team goes to the other site
Teleporters Galore: Everyone must teleport at least twice before planting
Smoke Break: If defending go to hookah and defend it until spike is planted
Wrong site: If attackers you must go to the other site first then to spawn before planting
Just Hanging: You must take zipwires until an enemy spots you
Zippidy doo dah: You must cross zipwires 3 times before killing anyone
Gambling: If on defense all team must hold from one spikesite
Zipwire wee: Go to A and you have to take the zipwire
Ropes are gross: No ropes allowed this round
